full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS KLU DBANG RGYAL PO'I SGRUB THABS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES BCOM LDAN 'DAS KLU DBANG PHYUG RGYAL PO'I SGRUB THABS 'PHAGS PA KLU SGRUB KYI GSUNG RAB DANG BCOM LDAN 'DAS RAL GRI'I PHYAG BZHES LA KHYER BDE NAGS 'GROS KYI TSUL DU LAS DANG PO PA RNAMS LA PHAN PHYIR LCAGS, @008B MO BYA LO CHOS 'PHRUL GYI ZLA BAR ZA HOR GYI BANDES SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI MTHAR BYAS PA BLO BZANG DBANG PO'O, ,)
